page.title: 04A DAY IN MY LIFE-L.HARROCKS
page.content: When I get up in morning I go down to have my breakfast. I usually have corn flakes. After that I get washed and clean my teeth and get dressed. Then I go to school. When I get to school I line up. Mrs Smith meets us and we go in and read for ten minutes. Then we go to assembly and sing some hymns. We go back to the classroom and do English, usually spelling. What we do is write down words into our spelling books and then put them into sentences. Then it's first play. After that we have maths. It's usually sums. Next we go to the hall for lunch, then I play football. We then go in and do our project, which is called the Domesday Project. I like it because we go on outings. Then it's games, my favourite part of the day. We often play Pip, Squeak and Wilfred.I go home with my Mum, have tea and go to bed.
